逗.definition: to tease (playfully); to entice; (coll.) to joke; (coll.) funny; amusing; to stay; to sojourn; brief pause at the end of a phrase (variant of 讀|读[dou4])

逗哈哈.definition: to joke; to crack a joke

逗哏.definition: funny man (lead role in comic dialogue 對口相聲|对口相声[dui4 kou3 xiang4 sheng1]); to joke; to play the fool; to provoke laughter

逗弄.definition: to tease; to provoke; to play with (a child, animal etc)

逗情.definition: to flirt; to titillate; to provoke

逗樂.definition: to amuse oneself; to clown around; to provoke laughter

逗留.definition: to stay for a while; to sojourn

逗笑.definition: to amuse; to cause to smile; amusing

逗笑兒.definition: erhua variant of 逗笑[dou4 xiao4]

逗趣.definition: to amuse; to make sb laugh; to tease

逗趣兒.definition: to amuse; to make sb laugh; to tease
